attributes.action: Stop HGVs from entering the villages of Baston and Langtoft.
attributes.background: In Langtoft and Baston HGV's use the village roads as access to the A15 even though King street and Cross road on the west and east points of the villages allow perfect and safe access to both A15 south and north and also the A1175 East and west. I propose concrete width restrictions to stop this.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor
